prompt:
Your task is to generate templates for natural language descriptions for actions and predicates defined in the PDDL planning language. Tokens starting with '?' are variables and serve as placeholders. They should always be surrounded by curly brackets in your output. For actions, also include the type for each parameter in the brackets if this information is available.
Do not start your output with a capitalized word and do not include sentence final punctuation.

examples_act.input:
action: grasp
description: grasp a box with an emtpy hand
parameters: (?obj ?obj2)
preconditions of grasp: ?obj is a hand and ?obj2 is a box and ?obj is empty and ?obj2 is on the table
effects of grasp: it becomes true that ?obj2 is being held by ?obj and it is not the case anymore that ?obj is empty and ?obj2 is on the table

action: RIDE-HORSE
description: ride a horse from one place to another place
parameters: (?h ?fl ?tl)
preconditions of RIDE-HORSE: ?h is a horse and ?fl is a location and ?tl is a location and ?h is at ?fl
effects of RIDE-HORSE: it becomes true that ?h is at ?tl and it is not the case anymore that ?h is at ?fl

action: put-down
description: put-down a block
parameters: (?obj)
preconditions of put-down: ?obj is being held
effects of put-down: it becomes true that ?obj is clear and hand is empty and ?obj is on the table and it is not the case anymore that ?obj is being held

action: move
description: move a chair from one room to another room
parameters: (?d ?o ?s)
preconditions of move: ?d is a room and ?o is a chair and ?s is a room and ?o is in ?s
effects of move: it becomes true that ?o is in ?d and it is not the case anymore that ?o is in ?s
